channel.title: How To Carry on getting your 300 free txt mesages per month (o2 genee card)
channel.description:
ok first put your £10 on to activate the 300 free txts
then remember the date they activate or the date you put the topup on (cant remember which one)
after the month is over set the date on your phone to the date they activated or the date you put the topup on
and you should get another free 300 txts
my sister has done this before but i havent personally
